Name: The 2020 Trail
About the game: 2020 will go down in history as one of the most disastrous years ever. Everyone alive felt the effects of the events — whether it was discrimination, politics, Mother Nature or the pandemic. To keep our heads up at Games with Geebs, we felt there was no better way to get through the chaotic times than to laugh at them. That's where The 2020 Trail comes in. “[Humor] offers a way of being sane in an insane place.” — Thomas Kuhlman Take a trip down memory lane in this Oregon Trail parody game where you traverse through the calendar year of 2020. Your decisions directly affect your mood and can make you more susceptible to catching the ‘rona. Don’t forget to stock up on toilet paper! Make decisions on how you spend the year Cook, dance, or skate to boost your mood and fend off depression Avoid catching the 'rona! Plow through pesky shoppers with carts Customize your character and time travel in style! Revisit the good, the bad, and the straight-up ridiculous events of 2020 Be THAT guy that stocks up on TP
